Thri-kreen Claws.name: Thri-kreen Claws
Thri-kreen Claws.flavor: You quickly lash out with all your claws, tearing at nearby enemies.
keywords:
Melee 1

Target: One, two, or three enemies

Attack: Strength + 3 vs. AC, Dexterity + 3 vs. AC, or Wisdom + 3 vs. AC
Thri-kreen Claws.attack:
Strength + 3 vs. AC, Dexterity + 3 vs. AC, or Wisdom + 3 vs. AC
Level 11: Strength + 6 vs. AC, Dexterity + 6 vs. AC, or Wisdom + 6 vs. AC
Level 21: Strength + 9 vs. AC, Dexterity + 9 vs. AC, or Wisdom + 9 vs. AC
Thri-kreen Claws.onHit:
1d8 + Strength modifier, Dexterity modifier, or Wisdom modifier damage. You gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to the number of targets.
Level 11: 2d8 + Strength modifier, Dexterity modifier, or Wisdom modifier damage
Level 21: 3d8 + Strength modifier, Dexterity modifier, or Wisdom modifier damage.

Mantis Jump.name: Mantis Jump
Mantis Jump.flavor: You coil and spring instinctively, covering a tremendous distance without much effort.
keywords:
Personal

Effect: You jump a number of squares equal to your speed. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.
Mantis Jump.effect: You jump a number of squares equal to your speed. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

Pheromone Release.name: Pheromone Release
Pheromone Release.flavor: Although imperceptible to most creatures, your pheromones have a significant effect on the behavior of other creatures.
Pheromone Release.effect: You gain a +5 power bonus to the next Bluff, Diplomacy, or Intimidate check you make before the end of your next turn. You can also gain this bonus to Nature checks made to calm or influence a beast.

Chameleon Chitin.name: Chameleon Chitin
Chameleon Chitin.flavor: Your powerful mind can rapidly change your exoskeleton to match the light and objects around you, allowing you to gain the advantage or slip away from the fight.
Chameleon Chitin.effect: You make a Stealth check. If you have any cover or concealment, you gain a +5 power bonus to this check. You can remain hidden without cover or concealment as long as you make no attacks and you take no action that requires you to make another Stealth check.

Mantis Dodge.name: Mantis Dodge
Mantis Dodge.flavor: The attack comes from far enough away that you react instinctively to leap away from its brunt.
keywords:
Personal

Trigger: You take damage from an area attack or a ranged attack against AC or Reflex.

Effect: You take only half damage from the triggering attack. After the attack is resolved, you can jump up to half your speed. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.
Mantis Dodge.trigger: You take damage from an area attack or a ranged attack against AC or Reflex.
Mantis Dodge.effect: You take only half damage from the triggering attack. After the attack is resolved, you can jump up to half your speed. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

Antennae Sense.name: Antennae Sense
Antennae Sense.flavor: Your antennae are sensitive enough to pick up vibrations around you, giving you a clear picture of your surroundings for a moment.
keywords:
Personal

Effect: You gain blindsight 10 until the end of your next turn.

Special: If you have the Thri-Kreen Antennae feat, you can use this power as an immediate reaction when you are blinded or otherwise deprived of sight.
Antennae Sense.effect: You gain blindsight 10 until the end of your next turn.
Antennae Sense.special: If you have the Thri-Kreen Antennae feat, you can use this power as an immediate reaction when you are blinded or otherwise deprived of sight.

Insect Mind.name: Insect Mind
Insect Mind.flavor: Your instincts take over as your higher mental functions fail you.
Insect Mind.trigger: You start your turn dazed, dominated, stunned, or unconscious, and you have at least 1 hit point.
Insect Mind.effect: You ignore the triggering effect until the end of this turn.
Insect Mind.special: If you have the Thri-Kreen Wild Talent feat, you can sustain this effect until the end of your next turn by taking a minor action and spending 1 power point.

Hive Consciousness.name: Hive Consciousness
Hive Consciousness.flavor: You extend your mind through your antennae, uniting the minds and senses of your allies with yours.
Hive Consciousness.target: You and each ally in the burst
Hive Consciousness.effect: Until the end of the encounter, each target cannot be flanked and gains a +2 power bonus to saving throws. Unless a creature or an object is invisible to or hidden from all targets, it is invisible to or hidden from none of them. Each target also gains telepathy 10 until the end of the encounter, but can use this telepathy only on other targets of this power.
Hive Consciousness.special: If you have the Thri-Kreen Antennae feat, each target also gains the benefit of that feat while the effect lasts.

Kinetic Chitin.name: Kinetic Chitin
Kinetic Chitin.flavor: Reacting to an impact, your exoskeleton temporarily hardens.
Kinetic Chitin.effect: You gain resist 10 to all damage until the end of your next turn.
